title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

text: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel. Author, maintainer. Didac Vidal-Piñeiro. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Mowinckel , Vidal-Piñeiro D (2026). ggsegICBM: ICBM Atlas 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 2.0.0, https://github.com/ggsegverse/ggsegICBM.

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
text: data/*.rda – Unified ggseg_atlas objects (3D , 2D geometry) R/data.R – Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegICBM-package.R – Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats R/sysdata.rda – Internal palette data (brain_pals) data-raw/ – Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegICBM
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: ICBM Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: ICBM Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: package contains dataset plotting ICBM white tract atlas ggseg ggseg3d. Mori et al., MRI Atlas Human White Matter. Elsevier, Amsterdam, Netherlands (2005) pubmed

title: ICBM Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: recommend installing ggseg-atlases ggseg r-universe: can install released version ggsegICBM GitHub :
code: # Enable this universe options(repos = c(     ggseg = 'https://ggseg.r-universe.dev',     CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Install some packages install.packages('ggsegICBM') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("LCBC-UiO/ggsegICBM")

title: ICBM Atlas for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Please note ‘ggsegICBM’ project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.
code: library(ggsegICBM) library(ggseg3d)  ggseg3d(atlas = icbm_3d) %>%    add_glassbrain("left") %>%    pan_camera("right lateral")

what: ggsegICBM: ICBM Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegICBM-package
title: ggsegICBM: ICBM Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegICBM-package
text: ICBM white matter atlas 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 3D mesh geometry, use 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegICBM: ICBM Atlas for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegICBM-package
text: Maintainer: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel .m.mowinckel@psykologi.uio.(ORCID) Authors: Didac Vidal-Piñeiro d.v.pineiro@psykologi.uio.(ORCID)

title: ICBM White Matter Atlas — icbm
text: Brain atlas ICBM DTI-81 white matter labels 26 tracts. Contains 3D mesh geometry ggseg3d::ggseg3d(). 2D polygon geometry available atlas.

title: ICBM White Matter Atlas — icbm
ICBM White Matter Atlas — icbm
ICBM White Matter Atlas — icbm
text: Mori et al., MRI Atlas Human White Matter. Elsevier, Amsterdam, Netherlands (2005) (Elsevier)

title: ggsegICBM 2.0.0
text: icbm_3d replaced icbm, ggseg_atlas object (ggseg.formats) containing 3D mesh data. _3d suffix dropped. Use ggseg3d::ggseg3d(atlas = icbm) 3D plots. ggseg.formats now hard dependency (Depends). Package URLs updated LCBC-UiO ggseg GitHub organisation.
